text: wmin hijaj allah ealaa khlqh, wdlaylh ealaa whdanyth wkmal qudratih akhtilaf allayl walnhar, wteaqbhma, wakhtilaf alshams walqamar wteaqbhma, kl dhlk taht tskhyrh wqhrh. la tasjuduu lilshams wala llqmr- f'inhma mdabbaran mkhlwqan- wasjuduu lilah aladhi khlqhn, 'iin kuntum hqqana mnqadyn lamrh sameyn mtyeyn lh, tebdwnh wahdah la sharik lh
